BRIEF-RIB Invests Into Capricot, Indian BIM Technology Company

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 09, 2019 14:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-RIB Invests Into Capricot, Indian BIM Technology Company Sept 9 (Reuters) - RIB Software SE : * DGAP-NEWS: RIB INVESTS INTO CAPRICOT, AN INDIAN BIM TECHNOLOGY LEADER WITH OVER 20,000 ACTIVE CONSTRUCTION SOFTWARE USERS AND THOUSANDS OF IT CLIENTS IN THE BUILDING VERTICAL * INVESTED 20% INTO COMPANY WITH RIGHT TO CONSOLIDATE CAPRICOT GROUP INTO RIB GROUP WITHIN NEXT YEARS * INVESTMENT WAS EXECUTED WITHIN A 7X EBIT/DA MULTIPLE
